name: Floating Puffer
description:
Controls:

  • Use wasd or the arrow keys to move and change the length of the rope
  • Use space to make the pufferfish puff up.

This is a submission for the "Ludum Dare 46" Game Jam, which means that this game was created in 72 hours.

The theme of the jam was "Keep it Alive". The idea of the game was for the crab to have to keep the pufferfish alive, while the pufferfish can also help the crab.

Please leave a rating on the Ludum Dare submission page (Ludum Dare participants only).
